dict.acceptation: 自我；自我的一部分；极端自私的人；[音乐]固定唱法时的E音；

sent.orig: Me, on the stage? Do you want me to make a fool of myself?; You're putting me on the spot if you want me to perform on the stage.
sent.trans: 让我上台表演，这不是要我的好看吗？

sent.orig: "Excuse me,"she said, "Can you tell me the way to King Street please?" The man smiled pleasantly. He did not understand English!
sent.trans: “对不起，”她说。“可以告诉我到国王街怎样走吗？”那个人令人愉快地微微一笑，他不懂英语！

sent.orig: A bicycle hit me and rolled me over.
sent.trans: 一辆自行车把我撞了个跟头。

sent.orig: A child came up to me and showed me the way to the station.
sent.trans: 一个孩子走上前来，指点我到车站的路。

sent.orig: A stranger walked up to me and asked me the time.
sent.trans: 一个陌生人走到我跟前，问我时间。
